summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Tenth Avenue Northeast, from East Seventy-fifth Street to East Eighty-fifth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same; providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 4770 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
